thread.title: Apple releases new emoji designed to call out cyber bullies
thread.title_full: Apple releases new emoji designed to call out cyber bullies

title: Apple releases new emoji designed to call out cyber bullies
text:
Apple releases new emoji designed to call out cyber bullies 
ABC Australia Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Australia Tech giant Apple has partnered with an anti-bullying campaign to release a new emoji designed to empower teenagers to call out acts of bullying.The new icon -- a black and white speech bubble with an eye in the centre -- was released as part of the company's latest iOS 9.1 software update rolled out on Wednesday.It is the centrepiece of the I Am A Witness campaign, which brings together heavyweights such as Facebook, Twitter and Google, to confront cyberbullying by providing children with a safe means to acknowledge and call out the mean behaviour that they commonly witness.The id...
